lead_paragraph: Marcos Baghdatis withstood a tough third set to beat Paradorn Srichaphan, 6-2, 3-6, 7-5, and advance to the China Open final in Beijing. Baghdatis, seeded third, will play for the title today against the fourth-seeded Mario Ancic.
snippet: Marcos Baghdatis withstood a tough third set to beat Paradorn Srichaphan, 6-2, 3-6, 7-5, and advance to the China Open final in Beijing. Baghdatis, seeded third, will play for the title today against the fourth-seeded Mario Ancic.
